name: @pulsemcp/pulse-crawl
description: MCP server for fetching and processing web content
author: PulseMCP

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd local && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.ci:install: npm ci && cd shared && npm ci && cd ../local && npm ci && cd ../../../libs/test-mcp-client && npm ci --ignore-scripts
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w local
scripts.build:test: npm run build && cd libs/test-mcp-client && npm run build
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:test && node scripts/run-vitest.js run -c vitest.config.integration.ts tests/integration/pulse-crawl.integration.test.ts && npm run clean
scripts.test:integration:source: npm run build:test && node scripts/run-vitest.js run -c vitest.config.integration.ts tests/integration/pulse-crawl.source.integration.test.ts && npm run clean
scripts.test:integration:built: npm run build:test && node scripts/run-vitest.js run -c vitest.config.integration.ts tests/integration/pulse-crawl.built.integration.test.ts && npm run clean
scripts.test:manual: npm run test:manual:features && npm run test:manual:pages
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:integration
